TextBlock.Text: DARVY: Heh. Get this, the <color=orange>Ghost Moon</color> is completely mucked up.
DARVY: From what we've gathered, it appears as if we need a higher level of technology to investigate.
DARVY: Or should I say a <color=orange>higher dimension</color> of technology.
DARVY: <color=red>(sigh)</color> Well, anyways, I think we'll have to build <color=orange>a space station</color> of sorts.
DARVY: You know, because of the space. Pun not intended.
DARVY: Actually, better idea, we should build a base on that <color=orange>asteroid orbiting the white gas giant</color>.
